Review Text: Very nice staff. Amazing drink and food. Nice energy and lots of fun.

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Some of the best cocktails I've had, anywhere.  We ordered 6 different drinks and 5 of them were fantastic - the only disappointing one came from my friend asking for 'extra spicy'. ‚Ä¶

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: I know this place have good reviews but we were disappointed. The place definitely needs more staff. We ordered cocktails and when we wanted to order some more food, the owner walked away. The food was tasty though. Be mindful if you are being late 5min you need to call and let them know

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Now this is the kind of place you dont cross very often. The atmosphere is very chill...the food is amazing...the waiters are friendly and attentive....but the owner was the one who made biggest impression. Sam is so dedicated to every ‚Ä¶

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: The names of the cocktails are a whole experience of their own! Very intriguing and poetic concepts-a lot of creative thought went into the names and descriptions. Then the drinks themselves?? Quite a few levels, way beyond the norm! This ‚Ä¶

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Best cocktails in Amsterdam. Staff is so friendly and competent. Thank you so much. :)

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Great cocktail bar, variety of interesting cocktails, friendly people and good service. Definitely worth the try to get the taste of cocktails offered here.

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Lovely spot. Went here for an open mic poetry afternoon with a few friends. Excellent mint tea. Very very nice bar.

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: American style service was top notch. Cocktails were hit or miss but the atmosphere and service was 5 stars.

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: nice homemade iced tea with ginger and lemongrass. and amazing Jamaican food on Mondays, really authentic!! it brought me back memories from holidays in Jamaica... they cooked the best rice & peas I've ever had and the saltfish fritters were mind blowing! great concept, my congratulations to the chefs!

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Owner was lovely, so was the cocktail (White Russian for me) You can tell the place is just opened but it really deserves a chance. Prices are a bit high for cocktails, although I suppose he uses the best liquor and ingredients in everything he makes. Would go again!

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: The best cocktail I've ever had in my life!

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Came only for drinks without a reservation, we had a seat in the bar immediately even though it was new year's eve. The cocktails were really nice and the service fast. We left very satisfied.

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Best cocktails in Amsterdam. Staff is so friendly and competent. Thank you so much. :)

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Great place to chill or have a conversation. All the shareable food is above average. Yes I have tried them all over a 3 week period. The special  drinks are decent but make sure the ingredients are ones you like.

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: So I went here for an open mic and was blown away by all the talented ppl who showed up. The food is good, drinks are great, staff is super friendly. Definitely worth it if you want to explore Amsterdam. I will be going back!

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text:
This is a hidden gem.

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Very nice staff. Excellent cocktails and food. I loved the cosy and suggestive atmosphere and will definitely visit again.

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text:
Nice place for cocktails. Not the usual IBA cocktails, but interesting compositions that seem well thought.
It's worth returning to try a few more.

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Best cocktails of Amsterdam and the only place in the city that serves them for a relatively modest price. The food (Caribbean/West-African) is just jummy, we rarely over eat but we had to keep ordering more. It's not a super chic cocktail ‚Ä¶

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Really unique spot with great soul food and cocktails to go along with it. The cocktail menu is really funky (which is an excellent thing) - They had one that was literally served out of a box with smoke coming out of it like it was the Undertaker from WWE or something :D

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Great place with African food. Cocktails are great too and the guy behind the bar is from Cameroon I believe. Not keen on the banana dessert though but hey that's me :-) We visited on the night they had poetry on. Not my thing, will go back ‚Ä¶

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Usually I'm a boring old fashioned type of guy, but Labyrinth has very innovative and interesting cocktails. Best place to experiment! Love the theme (poetry) nights as well.

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Amazing bar with a very strong cultural heritage and the best staff one can experience! Everyone there is friendly and the owner makes the best cocktails in Amsterdam! Good music and great food too! You‚Äôll love it!!!

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Beautiful place, wonderful cocktails (super big variety of tastes and mixes). Food amazing! We had a wonderful night, thank you so much!

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: You come for the Jazz and/or the poetry nights... And you stay for the amazing food and the beautiful cocktails. ‚Ä¶

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Cocktails are devine. I had a "Wild Nights" aaaand a "Dreamcatcher". My first drinks after the lockdown. My tastebuds are still dancing with joy.

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Cute little gem in Amsterdam, found it by accident, bartending friendly and professional, cocktails crazy and delicious

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Food was finger licking good. Mocktail was very tasty. Good amount of vegan choices on the menu. We went on a poetry night and the atmosphere was just phenomenal.

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: An unpretentious, friendly and uncrowded gem of a cocktail bar hidden away from the bustling center. Drinks are delicious, with great food way beyond your standard bitterballen nonsense you'd expect from a bar - and kitchen is still open at 10pm! Also, poetry evening/open mic on Mondays, great for a relaxed weekday event.

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Best cocktails of Amsterdam!! I have been looking for a decent place for cocktail for ages and theirs are just amazing! The manager is super friendly and passionate about what he does üëåüèΩ, nibbles are also super tasty, especially those ribs üòç!!

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: This place had amazing cocktails ! I have been Amsterdam a few times so i wanted to venture instead of going to the typical bars in Dam Square. Amazing chef, staff and the manager/bartender was extremely friendly.

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Delicious cocktail and tasty food although all the foods are varietions lf standard appetizers

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text:

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Such an amazing place. Fantastic vibe and service, only to be topped by the cocktails.

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Without doubt the best cocktail bar in Amsterdam, and also the best I‚Äôve been to in Europe so far! The bartender was an absolute magician when coming up with any cocktail you ask for, and the cocktail tastes simply amazing.

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Great service, great food and unique drinks, chill atmosphere

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Pretty sure I have already given this place 5 stars before. Sam and Lincie run a great cocktail bar... possibly the best in Amsterdam! Check their website and you can catch some pretty fun poetry and vocal performances as well. Unique cocktails and immpecable presentation. Try WILD NIGHTS for two.

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Love this place, hoping they get open mics and poetry back soon!

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail

Name: Labyrinth Cocktail
Review Text: Amazing drinks and great service! Can't get over the quality of the cocktails and bar snacks- highly recommend everyone stopping in for at least a drink or staying for poetry readings and live music!

Review Text: We organized a dinner here for about 40 people at pretty short notice. It all worked out great, the staff were very attentive, the food was wonderful, and prices reasonable. Would recommend.
